author: lem888
content:
Hi Guys! I need a bit of help again. Could someone help me with the following? Specifically, as mentioned above, I am looking for information on possible whistleblowing messages being censored (at least temporarily) in Ethereum 2.0 network. Thanks to <@!755590043632140352> I used beaconcha.in (Validators > Slashing tab) and checked each case individually. But what confuses me is how to determine WHEN the first whistleblow message happened. Take example of https://beaconcha.in/validator/4390#blocks . It says that this validator was "Slashed by 11111 at Slot 17,184, Reason: Attestation Violation". But how do I check when the first whistleblowing message actually took place?

Please help me with this, I would be eternally grateful for any kind of help!

author: pipermerriam
content: <@!386593326402633741> you will probably have a higher success rate here if you show your work.  In this specific example, what have you done or looked into to try and find out how these messages are transmitted?  What research have you done to try and answer this question yourself?  If you want to continue this discussion, I'll encourage you to use <#595721451651465227> as this discussion isn't appropriate for this channel.
